abstract: Anna Ewing, Nasdaq's chief information officer, talks about the speed of trades, which now take place in under 100 microseconds, which is one one-millionth of a second. That's not fast enough for today's stock traders and will be laughably slow for tomorrow's traders. Ms. Ewing said, "It's a march to zero."

headline.main: For Nasdaq, a Race to Zero
